display_name: Itchy rash has affected any of the following places: the folds of the elbows, behind the knees, in front of the ankles, under the buttocks, or around the neck, ears or eyes
description:
Item from the International Study of Asthma and Allergies in Childhood (ISAAC) eczema module. [Asher MI, Keil U, Anderson HR, et al. 1995 (PubMed ID: 7789502)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/7789502/)

[Search for all ISAAC variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/pats/variables?search=isaac)
